TopicTitle: Modding Monday: Stock jet Turbines Resurrected!

Articles.Content: <figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"><img src="http://41.media.tumblr.com/ab8ca95fa6c767a94ca66db2600759c6/tumblr_inline_nxrqxdyKNt1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="92" data-orig-width="480"/></figure><figure class="tmblr-full" data-orig-height="1024" data-orig-width="1280"><img src="http://36.media.tumblr.com/a822136c239c40f8b0124057768364d7/tumblr_inline_nxrqzgaGVW1rr2wit_540.jpg" data-orig-height="1024" data-orig-width="1280"/></figure><p>We planned to include the jet engine internals as a feature in patch 1.0.5, but ultimately decided they need a bit more work before they make their appearance in a stock game. If you really like the look then Bloody_looser’s <a href="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/138896-1-0-5-Stock-jet-Turbines-resurrected">Stock Jet Turbines Resurrected</a> mod applies a few simple configuration tweaks to unlock them. #KSP.</p>
Good pick! It's a nice little patch until you plan on officially adding them :)

This should have gotten included.

Make the engine itself and the nozzle separate parts, and make it so that the nozzle's thrust decreases the further it is from the engine.
Nice! I've always wanted the jet engines to be shaped more correctly. Now I don't have to wait.

i like these in general, but would it be too difficult to make them toggleable (in the same way say the new engine fairings can be disabled in 1.0.5).

It shouldnt be too much work to allow us to use them (default to on ofc), and itll let those of us that have some sci-fi designs or other craft of the sort which would be completely ruined by the new engine turbines (and also for VTOL makes, myself i dont really make jet VTOLS, but there is enough people who do that the turbines, if forced upon them, would kill designs in terms of appearance).
[img]http://imgur.com/Dfp8dEy.png[/img]
The craft below has an intake attached directly to a rapier, yes, this is not realistic, but then again, its intended as a sci-fi styled vessel, and hence realism falls out the door anyway. Please do everyone a favor and make them an toggleable option in the hangar/vab when you finally decide to add them to the stock game. Im all for more options, but ive already suffered alot of craft breaking over the last few updates, please dont kill my beloved Tri-Fighter IV!
[img]http://imgur.com/QvN0LVZ.png[/img]
Dont make Jeb sad by ruining his favorite fighter :D
[img]http://imgur.com/fNn7LyE.png[/img]

[quote name='panzer1b']i like these in general, but would it be too difficult to make them toggleable (in the same way say the new engine fairings can be disabled in 1.0.5).[/QUOTE]

Happy Flying

Well, I'm still waiting for 1.1 to see this for KSP. Can't wait till then :D

Stock cockpit does that btw.

there is a very particular spot you doubleclick on, bottom corner when you look directly in front.

Its kinda hard to activate that view, but it is in the stock pits.
